thumb.title: [TAS]不思議のダンジョン 風来のシレン GB 月影村の怪物 "arbitrary code execution" by CasualPokePlayer in 04:06.51
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oIFqkHh4XVI流行りなのかな・・・以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6586M TAS originally published on 2025-06-06Fushigi no Dungeon - Fuurai no Shiren GB - Tsukikage Mura no Kaibutsu, translated as Mystery Dungeon - Shiren the Wanderer - The Monsters of Moonlight Village, is an entry in the Mystery Dungeon series of roguelike games. The game follows Shiren The Wanderer, and his talking weasel Koppa.Rather than go on an adventure with Shiren, CasualPokePlayer ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/CasualPokePlayer) instead abuses input handling programming errors to execute arbitrary code, showing off the popular "Bad Apple!!" music video in the game itself. This video includes the song "Bad Apple!!" from Touhou Gensoukyou ~ Lotus Land Story (東方幻想郷 ~ Lotus Land Story). The song was originally composed by ZUN then arranged by Masayoshi Minoshima (Alstroemeria Records). It was sung by nomico with lyrics from Haruka. The music video shown was created by あにら (Anira).
thumb.last_res_body: ？？？ 名作だー 前々からポケモンT... はい (さっきのは何だっ... ！？ 最近apple%よく見るな バッドアップル流... GBでこんな曲流せ... ！？ 海外を中心と...

tags.tag: まるで意味がわからんぞ！
